document.full_text: mardy fish replaced andy roddick as the top-ranked american after beating spain's david ferrer 7-5 6-2 on wednesday to move into the semi-finals of the sony ericsson open.
document.title: fish becomes top-ranked u.s. player with win at sony open
lines_and_colors: mardy fish replaced andy roddick as the top-ranked american after beating spain's david ferrer 7-5 6-2 on wednesday to move into the semi-finals of the sony ericsson open.
